definition: system/to control/to regulate/variant of 製|制[zhi4]
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Purpose To study limb immobilization influencing on denervated muscle atrophy.
sentences.chinese: 結論肢體制動加速了失神經支配肌肉萎縮的發展。

sentences.english: Forged module, "H"type section, two fist-end type, drum braking.
sentences.chinese: 鍛壓成型，工字形斷面，兩端拳式，鼓式制動器。

sentences.english: Your guide hand is placed above the belay device friction brake.
sentences.chinese: 您的導向手應放在繩栓摩擦制動裝備上面。

sentences.english: The brake lever axle hole should be pointing towards the top of the kingpin.
sentences.chinese: 制動杆的軸孔應指向對主銷的頂部。

sentences.english: Without this device, a lot of drivers would have very tired legs.
sentences.chinese: 沒有制動助力器那麼司機的腿會非常疲勞。

sentences.english: Methods The operation consisted of using fibula to block the posterior ankle.
sentences.chinese: 方法取胖骨在踝後作制動的跟骨阻擋術。

sentences.english: Dynamic and thermal brake torque characteristics of the larger.
sentences.chinese: 熱動和制動轉矩較大等優良的特性。

sentences.english: Did your 240 have that problem with the sticky parking-brake cable?
sentences.chinese: 你的240有駐車制動拉線方面的毛病嗎？

sentences.english: They also called for legally enshrined debt brakes in all eurozone countries.
sentences.chinese: 他們還要求在所有歐元區國家立法實現“債務制動”。

sentences.english: The hoisting machine can work normally, the brake should be reliable.
sentences.chinese: 提升捲揚機應能正常工作，制動器應工作可靠。

sentences.english: During this check, the red brake warning lamp and the anti-lock warning lamp are illuminated.
sentences.chinese: 在這項檢查中，紅色制動警告燈和防抱死警告燈亮。

sentences.english: Pull on parking brake after parking.
sentences.chinese: 停車後要拉上駐車制動器。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a single air chamber double loop pressure braking device.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型爲一種單氣室雙迴路氣壓制動裝置。

sentences.english: The success of the ship's emergency astern depends on the proper operation of the main engine.
sentences.chinese: 緊急制動成功與否，決定於主機操縱的正確程度。

sentences.english: A brake valve tube is glidingly connected and sealed with the upper cover by adhesive.
sentences.chinese: 制動閥管與上蓋間爲滑動配合連接，並以粘合劑密封。

sentences.english: I put on the brake before the car knocked into the fire engine.
sentences.chinese: 我踏下了制動器纔沒有撞到救火車上。

definition: valve (esp. tire valve)/accelerator (obsolete term for 油門|油门)/stigma (zool.)/spiracle
